# What's going on here?

Some math

$$\pi(\varphi) = \int \varphi(x) \pi({\rm d}x).$$

Here we are testing RMarkdown rendering.

```{r}
mc <- function(mu, f, N) {
  v = 0.0
  for (i in 1:N) {
    x <- mu()
    v <- v + f(x)
  }
  return(v/N)
}

unif <- function() {
  return(runif(1))
}

g = sin

N <- 1000

system.time(y <- mc(unif, g, N))

print(paste(y, ", ", 1.0 - cos(1.0)))
```
